name: U R HMSTR
description:
Take care of your pet, but you are not the owner, YOU ARE the pet!

Play in browser or download for windows or android.

This is a simple game I started making in 2015 and now, 6 years later, finally could make available. There is no end and nothing bad will happen to your animal if one of the bars gets depleted.

If you experience problems with the game, I would be happy if you would give feedback in the comments or on my discord server: https://discord.gg/XBbbVDcscQ
You can try the downloadable versions for better performance an resolution.

Cheats:
[F2] activate debug menu   [Right MB] create food   [Middle MB] create poo   [M] create mulch   [R] restart game
(game may lag or crash when creating to many objects)
